column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: disaster type. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix disaster: <http://www.example.org/disaster#> .disaster:Disaster rdf:type rdfs:Class . disaster:NaturalDisaster rdf:type rdfs:Class . disaster:ManmadeDisaster rdf:type rdfs:Class .disaster:NaturalDisaster rdfs:subClassOf disaster:Disaster .disaster:ManmadeDisaster rdfs:subClassOf disaster:Disaster .disaster:Earthquake rdf:type rdfs:Class .disaster:Flood rdf:type rdfs:Class .disaster:Hurricane rdf:type rdfs:Class .disaster:Earthquake rdfs:subClassOf disaster:NaturalDisaster .disaster:Flood rdfs:subClassOf disaster:NaturalDisaster .disaster:Hurricane rdfs:subClassOf disaster:NaturalDisaster .disaster:NuclearAccident rdf:type rdfs:Class .disaster:TerroristAttack rdf:type rdfs:Class .disaster:IndustrialAccident rdf:type rdfs:Class .disaster:NuclearAccident rdfs:subClassOf disaster:ManmadeDisaster .disaster:TerroristAttack rdfs:subClassOf disaster:ManmadeDisaster .disaster:IndustrialAccident rdfs:subClassOf disaster:ManmadeDisaster .disaster:loss rdf:type rdf:Property .disaster:loss rdfs:domain disaster:Disaster .disaster:loss rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .disaster:location rdf:type rdf:Property .disaster:location rdfs:domain disaster:Disaster .disaster:location rdfs:range rdfs:Literal . disaster:date rdf:type rdf:Property .disaster:date rdfs:domain disaster:Disaster .disaster:date rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .```
